0.name: ActionList
0._ToolTip: Go to slide by title topic
0.title: Example

3.comment: A self-contained list with only one programmer-required call: init

15.source:
function readMe() {
    return "A self-contained list.  The programmer should only call a single " +
    "method, init(aListObject) which sets up the list.  AListObject is of the " +
    "form {title: aString, items:aListOfStrings, action:function(aString)} " +
    "on selection, aListObject.action(selection) will be called.  title is " +
    "optional.  When it is present, it is always the first item in the list, " +
    "and selecting it results in no action.  Also, when present, the list will " +
    "always show the title .  See this.example() for an example use"
    
}
